title: Does F1 need a different championship format?
description: A look at the pro's and cons of any rules tweak which would ensure F1's championship fight always goes to the final race of the season.
itunes:title: Does F1 need a different championship format?
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: A look at the pro's and cons of any rules tweak which would ensure F1's championship fight always goes to the final race of the season.
itunes:summary: A look at the pro's and cons of any rules tweak which would ensure F1's championship fight always goes to the final race of the season.
